title: Brimstone Part 2: Everything Burns
description: What would you do to save the one who hurt you the deepest?The one you loved the most?Garret is a blacksmith in a small town in the Appalachian Mountains. But two years after a young woman dies in a lonely cabin, a darkness falls over Garret's home. A shadow that breaks families and skirts the edges of nightmares.A dead girl, a five hundred year old secret, and a creature from another age. Something is waiting for Garret, and it's been holding a grudge for a long, long time.Only when Garret comes face to face with the creature does he realize the truth.He can't beat it.He never could.
author: Daniel  Foster
